languages.text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Оперативник немедленно накладывает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} на каждого противника в бою, а затем совершает атаку. Эта атака не расходует лимит атак на ход и всегда достигает цели.
-<indent=5%>Цель этой атаки до конца боя получает штраф −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>До конца боя атаки оперативника требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} больше.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
- The Adept immediately inflicts 1 clue on all enemies in combat.
- The Adept makes a free attack against a target. It always hits.
- Until the end of combat, the target suffers a -30% penalty to dodge and a -30% penalty to armour.
- Until the end of combat, the Adept's attacks cost +1 AP more.

The Adept immediately inflicts 1 exploit on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to dodge and a −30% penalty to armour.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Adept's attacks cost +1 AP more.</indent>

The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Адепт немедленно накладывает 1 уязвимость на каждого противника в бою, а затем совершает атаку. Эта атака не расходует лимит атак на ход и всегда достигает цели.
-<indent=5%>Цель этой атаки до конца боя получает −30% к уклонению и −30% к броне.</indent>
-<indent=5%>До конца боя атаки адепта требуют на 1 ОД больше.</indent>

Адепт немедленно накладывает 1 уязвимость на каждого противника в бою, а затем совершает атаку. Эта атака не расходует лимит атак на ход и всегда достигает цели.
-<indent=5%>Цель этой атаки до конца боя получает −30% к уклонению и −30% к броне.</indent>
-<indent=5%>До конца боя атаки адепта требуют на 1 ОД больше.</indent>

languages.text:
特工立刻对战斗中的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，之后无消耗地对目标发动一次攻击。此次攻击必定命中。
- <indent=5%>受到攻击的目标会承受-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}减值和-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}减值，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>特工的所有攻击耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
技师立刻对战斗中的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，之后无消耗地对目标发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}。
- <indent=5%>受到攻击的目标会承受-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}和-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}减值，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>技师的所有攻击，耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}立刻对战斗中的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，之后无消耗地对目标发动一次攻击。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}。
- <indent=5%>受到攻击的目标会承受-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}和-30%的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}减值，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>特工的所有攻击耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

languages.text:
El agente inflige inmediatamente 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos del combate y lanza un ataque gratis contra un objetivo. Ese ataque siempre impacta.
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo del ataque sufre una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del agente cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} más.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El agente inflige inmediatamente 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos del combate y lanza un ataque gratis contra un objetivo. Ese ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo del ataque sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del -30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del agente cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} más.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が戦闘中のすべての敵に即座に1{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}付与し、ターゲット1体に対してフリー攻撃を行う。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}する。
- <indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}-30%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}-30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、オペレーターの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが+1増加する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
アデプトが戦闘中のすべての敵に即座に1{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}付与し、ターゲット1体に対してフリー{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}を行う。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}する。
- <indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避率{/g}-30%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}-30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、アデプトの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが1増加する。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が戦闘中のすべての敵に即座に1{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}付与し、ターゲット1体に対してフリー攻撃を行う。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}する。
- <indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}-30%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}-30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、オペレーターの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが+1増加する。</indent>

languages.text:
Der Agent fügt allen Feinden im Kampf augenblicklich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} zu und führt dann einen kostenlosen Angriff auf ein Ziel aus, der immer trifft.
-<indent=5%>Das Ziel dieses Angriffs hat bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen Abzug von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und einen Abzug von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Angriffs kosten die Angriffe des Agenten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Agent fügt allen Feinden im Kampf augenblicklich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} zu und führt dann einen kostenlosen Angriff auf ein Ziel aus, der immer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Das Ziel dieses Angriffs erleidet bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Angriffs kosten die Angriffe des Agenten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr.</indent>

languages.text:
L'agent inflige immédiatement 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible. Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un coup.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les attaques de l'agent coûtent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de plus.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
L'agent inflige immédiatement 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible. Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un coup.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les attaques de l'agent coûtent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de plus.</indent>

languages.text:
Ajan, çatışmadaki tüm düşmanlarda anında 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} oluşturur, ardından bir hedefe serbest bir saldırı gerçekleştirir. Bu saldırı her daim vurur.
-<indent=5%>Saldırının hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerine −%30 ceza puanı alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ajan'ın saldırılarının {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli +1 artar. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on all enemies in combat, then makes a free attack against a target. That attack always hits.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>
